title: Are We in a Parallel Universe? | Guest: Sara Gonzales | 2/1/22
description:
Glenn ponders whether we’re in a parallel universe as the political divide continues to get bigger across the country. The Left’s beliefs are their religion and the government their god. What is modern monetary theory, and how is it involved with inflation? Once every American stands for the rights of all mankind, everything else will fix itself. Glenn reads a New York Times article by David Brooks and explains why the world is going mad. Glenn and Stu discuss the Joe Rogan controversy, as Glenn gives his prediction on the future of Joe Rogan and his podcast. Blaze TV host Sara Gonzales joins Glenn to discuss her comedy video parodying Nancy Pelosi, Joe Rogan, and the Freedom Convoy of truckers in Canada.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
